October 14, 2018 ( 2018-10-14 )

Ashlee+Evan is an American reality television series on E!. It stars Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross.[1][2]

Premise [ edit ]

Ashlee+Evan follows Ashlee Simpson and Evan Ross, son of Diana Ross, as they try to balance their lives as new parents and the pressures of living up to their famous family names.[3][4]
